entry.title: Bridge returned error 500! (18723)
entry.content:
blm5280 - Instagram Bridge was unable to receive or process the remote website's content!
Error message: `Unable to find username in search result.`
Query string: `action=display&bridge=Instagram&context=Username&u=blm5280&media_type=all&direct_links=on&format=Atom`
Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

pauder

entry.title: “As we strive to prevent and end sexual violence, we must...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

“As we strive to prevent and end sexual violence, we must start by interacting with survivors in a supportive, empathetic, and trauma-informed manner.”

#SAAM2021 #SAAM #BelieveBlackWomen #ProtectBlackWomen

“Where’s the evidence?” “Why doesn’t she come forward?” “Why didn’t she call the police?” These are all quotes I have heard for years in my clinical work and research with victims and survivors of sexual violence, as well as in my work with youth and adults who have sexually offend...

coloradosun.com

Opinion: Why too few Black women and girls report sexual violence

“Where’s the evidence?” “Why doesn’t she come forward?” “Why didn’t she call the police?” These are all quotes I have heard for years in my clinical work and research with victims and survivors of sexual violence, as well as in my work with youth and adults who have sexually offend...“Where’s the evidence?” “Why doesn’t she come forward?” “Why didn’t she call the police?” These are all quotes I have heard for years in my clinical work and research with victims and survivors of sexual violence, as well as in my work with youth and adults who have sexually offend...

entry.title: “Join our weekly FREE Sister Circle -a space for Black women,...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

“Join our weekly FREE Sister Circle -a space for Black women, dedicated to centering Black Women. A space to breathe and be in community with one another. Register by emailing counseling@blueprintny.org

Healing space for us to gather, grieve, affirm, uplift, amplify, stretch and expand together. Please share manifestations, affirmations, and healing space virtually with us.

Join us for intentionality, meditations, candle lighting, discussion, remembrance and resistance, altar building, and collective healing. See you Thursday at 7!”

THU, APR 8 AT 5:00 PM MDT

Collective Ritual and Healing Through Sister Circle

Online Event34 people interested

entry.title: “For black women, the combined and compounded effects of...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

“For black women, the combined and compounded effects of sexism and racism can heighten depressive and PTSD symptoms. Additionally, there is evidence that sexual trauma experienced by adult black women can result in more symptoms of PTSD with a greater severity of symptoms than when the trauma happens in childhood.”

#SAAM2021 #SAAM #BelieveBlackWomen #ProtectBlackWomen #PROTECTBLACKWOMENATALLCOSTS
https://timesupfoundation.org/black-survivors-and-sexual-t…/

Black women are subjected to both racism and sexism — a double bind that puts black women at higher risk for sexual violence.

timesupfoundation.org

Black Survivors and Sexual Trauma - TIME'S UP Foundation

Black women are subjected to both racism and sexism — a double bind that puts black women at higher risk for sexual violence.Black women are subjected to both racism and sexism — a double bind that puts black women at higher risk for sexual violence.

entry.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Black Women's BlueprintSexual Assault Awareness Month is an annual campaign observed in April. The mission of this...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280Black Women's Blueprint

Sexual Assault Awareness Month is an annual campaign observed in April. The mission of this month is to raise awareness about sexual violence around the world, ...and to educate communities on how to prevent it. Survivors rise when we build the future shoulder to shoulder to end patriarchy and white supremacy.

#sexualassaultawarenessmonth #sexualassaultawareness #saam #saam2021

entry.title: Black Lives Matter 5280BLM 5280 Freedom SchoolBlack families, we want to hear from you! Join us for a virtual focus group to help us plan...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280BLM 5280 Freedom School

Black families, we want to hear from you!

Join us for a virtual focus group to help us plan our summer 2021 Freedom School. Each family will receive $50 for th...eir participation.

Unable to make it to a focus group? Fill out a survey to share your ideas! Survey participants will have an opportunity to win one of several gift cards.

Who: Black Families with Children in Grades k-5
What: Focus Group or Survey
When: Focus Groups 4/6, 6 pm -7:30 pm MDT and
4/10, 1 pm -2:30 pm MDT
We are accepting surveys through April 30
Where: Virtually, DM us on Facebook to participate

DM us on Facebook to participate

entry.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280’s Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...

coloradogives.org

Black Lives Matter 5280
